meta.name: ping
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: Ping
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: select max("percent_packet_loss") as "packet_loss" from ping WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)

select mean("average_response_ms") as "average", mean("minimum_response_ms") as "min", mean("maximum_response_ms") as "max" from ping WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:)
